name: YSSOA
description: The ergonomic body-hugging high back provides lumbar support and naturally follows your spine's natural curve. It is tall enough to support your entire spine. The back can be adjusted from 90° to 120°. The ergonomic armrest allows you to put hands on the armrest to relax.

name: YSSOA
description: 360 degree swivel game chair can be more flexible in working station. The back of the chair can be adjusted from 90° to 120°, convenient to lie down for a rest. Height-adjustable computer game chair is suitable for different tables/occasions.The ergonomically designed office chair can release fatigue and stress during long hours of gaming or work.

name: X Rocker
description: Take your gaming setup to the next level with headrest mounted speakers and a sub-woofer that provide high quality audio and real-time vibration for an immersive experience.

name: OLIXIS
description: This racing style gaming chair is equipped with flip-up arms for position reinforcement. The armrests can flip up when they’re not in use, ideal if you want to get something more compact or want a little bit of freedom in your movements. Also keeping you comfy for long hours of game or work.

name: FDW
description: Due to the mesh on the sitting surface, the mesh chair has strong air permeability, which is conducive to the heat dissipation of the body. Sitting on it has air circulation, which will greatly help the heat dissipation of the human body and achieve the effect of ventilation and cooling.

name: X Rocker
description: Faux leather lounging game chair can be used for playing video games, watching movies and TV, listening to music, reading, and relaxing. Connect quickly to your devices, and enjoy music, mobile games, tv or movies. Optional RCA cables included.

name: X Rocker
description: Leather lounging game chair can be used for playing video games, watching movies and TV, listening to music, reading, and relaxing.  Connects to Xbox, PlayStation, Gameboy, MP3/CD/DVD, and home theater systems. Weight Capcity 275 lbs.

name: X Rocker
description: Conveniently connect to most gaming systems or wireless devices via wireless transmitter so you can enjoy video games, movies, music, and more.Ergonomic design with pedestal swivel base, padded armrests, and head rest provides maximum support and mobility during your longest gaming sessions.

name: YSSOA
description: Ergonomic design helps you maintain a neutral, balanced posture. Well-padded seat, lumbar & headrest cushions make gaming sessions more enjoyable. With the retractable footrest，you can relieve tension on your legs and knees.

name: OLIXIS
description: This racing style gaming chair is equipped with flip-up arms for position reinforcement. The armrests can flip up when they’re not in use, ideal if you want to get something more compact or want a little bit of freedom in your movements. Also keeping you comfy for long hours of game or work.

name: SMUG
specialFeature: Adjustable Height, Arm Rest, Ergonomic, Rolling, Swivel, Head Support.
description: Our chair is designed to hug your back for long-lasting comfort. 90-117 degrees adjustable, convenient for resting & working, take the pressure off your back. Try this ergonomic office chair and feel the difference it makes in your life. This desk chair is suitable for people of most heights, strong to hold up to 300 pounds.

name: SMUG
specialFeature: Adjustable Height, Arm Rest, Ergonomic, Rolling, Swivel, Head Support.
description: The mesh back and seat keep you at a comfortable temperature, and prevent sweating from long seating. This desk chair is suitable for people of most heights, strong to hold up to 300 pounds.Chairs for bedroom desk, home office department, college dormitory, and other daily usage. It is a good gift for Thanksgiving Day, Christmas, birthday, and so on.
